author: Staff Reporter
text:
‘Amma’ water bottles sold by the Tamil Nadu State Transport Corporation (TNSTC) have started coming without the photo of Chief Minister Jayalalithaa, to comply with the model code of conduct that came to effect from Friday afternoon.

Instructions

Senior officials in the state transport corporation said that they have received instructions to affix stickers over the image of the Chief Minister from Friday. “On Friday half the stock we got was without image of the Chief Minister,” he said.

The official said that they have instructed personnel at the sales points to affix blank stickers on the images of the Chief Minister in the older stock. “Such stock would be exhausted on Saturday and stock we receive from Saturday night will be without the images of the Chief Minister,” he added.
title: CM’s photo removed from Amma water bottles
